archimate:BusinessObject.name: TrafficConditioningProfile
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: "This object class represents a collection of attributes, which are used to define the traffic conditioning parameters (e.g., bandwidth characteristics) on a Termination Point (TP). See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0052, R_TMF518_NRF_I_0053 and R_TMF518_NRF_I_0054."
